reviewText:
The routines are the shorten versions, of the LP skits, showcasing their comic genius, but I'll take what I can get
The Video is worth it, If you like Wayne & Shuster as much as I.
Try to get the LP  " WAYNE & SHUSTER in Person"
with  Shakespearean Baseball Game  Rinse The Blood Off My Toga  Frontier Psychiatrist  I Was A TV Addict

A Classic

I was disappointed to find that this was only a few bits of a few of the skits of Wayne and Shuster's entire episodes. Why didn't they include all,of the main or most popular ones, instead of snippets
enjoyable nostalgic overview of clever comedians
I did not like this very dvd for the stated reasons of the previous speakers. But there is simply no alternative.
Instead of reasonable length sketches, we have to wade through boring, self serving commentary by Schuster. Total disappointment! And to think I was waiting for this..,.

In the 1960s, I used to hear Wayne and Shuster on long playing records.  Rinse the Blood off My Toga, Frontier Psychiatrist, Shakespearian Ball Game etc.  I have been looking for this material for a while and was hopeful when I saw this DVD that I could again enjoy these classics.  The DVD did contain both the Toga and Ball Game skits which were mostly true to form but missed the Frontier Psychiatrist which was a shame.  The issue I have with the DVD was that it was too eratic and fast paced so that there were only very small snippets of a lot of material.  It might have been better to record the full versions of their better stuff and leave out a lot of bits and pieces which I found a bit frustrating as you were just getting into it and they had moved on.  I am happy with what I've got and others will equally enjoy the skill and brilliance of these two comedians and entertainers.
